long_description: Smith Gibson polarized sunglasses hark back to the days of mustache-adorned television stars and 4 channels of TV. Give your eyes that old school style with new school protection. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Carbonic TLT lenses provide 100% UVA/B/C protection and incorporate Smith Tapered Lens Technology(TM) to optimize viewing clarity. Tapered Lens Technology contours the thickness of the lens so that light travels through without distortion-what you see is what you get. 6 base-curve lens: the higher the number the more curved the lens-Smith features sunglasses with 6, 7, 8 and 9 base curvature. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact-resistant. Havana frames feature polarized brown lenses, ideal for medium to bright conditions, that reduce glare and enhance contrast while maintaining true colors. Lightweight frames have a medium fit with medium coverage. Smith Gibson polarized sunglasses include a protective storage bag.
